sqlset.name: COMPETENCY_ACCESSMENT
sqlset.sql-query: INSERT INTO CA_CODESET ( CODESET_ID, OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, PARENT_CODESET_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
INSERT INTO CA_CODESET ( OPTION_ID, USER_ID, GUEST_ID, VOTE_DATE, IP ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT COUNT(CODESET_ID) FROM CA_CODESET WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ?
SELECT CODESET_ID, CREATION_DATE FROM CA_CODESET WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ? AND PARENT_CODESET_ID IS NULL ORDER BY CREATION_DATE ASC
SELECT CODESET_ID, PARENT_COMMENT_ID FROM CA_CODESET WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ? AND PARENT_CODESET_ID IS NOT NULL ORDER BY CREATION_DATE, CODESET_ID ASC
